Naša politika o zasebnosti razloži kako,: Our privacy policy explains how, why, and what information we store when you use our site.
Podatki o igri, ki jo igrate: Information about the game you play
Kdaj ste obiskali stran: Time in which you visited our site
Koliko časa igrate določeno igro: How long you play a particular game
Rezultat, ki ste ga dosegli v igri (če t: Score you achieved in the game (if such action is supported by the game)
Operacijski sistem, ki ga uporabljate: The operating system you are using
Vse podatke, katere shranimo, uporabimo: We use all information we store to improve the najigre.com web portal. By analyzing this information, we can understand many key things that would greatly improve your experience and that of others when using our web portal.
Naš spletni portal je namenjen za otroke: Our portal is for children 13 years of age or older. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 13.
Piškotki so majhne datoteke, ki se shran: Cookies are small files that are stored on your computer and contain information about your interaction with najigre.com.
Da shranimo vašo prejšnjo sejo: s pomočj: To save your previous session: Using the previous session, let's us figure out what games you like best and show you games that align with your interests.
Partnerji, kot sta Google Analytics in D: Partners like Google Analytics and DoubleClick can also install the cookies they need to functional properly. For more information on how the mentioned partners store your information, see here:
Kako izbrisati in upravljati piškotke?: How to delete and manage cookies?
Kako onemogočiti piškotke na Google Chro: How to disable cookies on the Google Chrome browser:
Klikni na gumb Meni (desni kot zgoraj): Click the Menu button (right as above)
Pod sekcijo »Zasebnost in varnost« klikn: Under the »Privacy & Security« section, click »Site Settings«
Pod sekcijo »Dovoljenja« klikni na »Pišk: Under the »Permissions« section, click on »Cookies and Website Information«
Onemogoči piškotke s klikom na »Blokiraj: Disable cookies by clicking »Block cookies from other sites« and »Allow sites to store and read cookie data (recommended)«
Kako izbrisati piškotke na Google Chrome: How to clear cookies in Google Chrome browser:
Klikni »Ogled vseh piškotkov in podatkov: Click »View all cookies and site data«
S klikom ma gumb »Odstrani vse« boste iz: Clicking the »Remove All« button will delete all cookies.
V piškotih ne hranimo nobenih podatkov,: We do not store any data in your cookies that could reveal your identity (email, name ..).
Povežite se z nami preko socialnih omrež: Connect with us through social networks!
Če želite več informacij o piškotkih, la: For more information on cookies, you can
Najigre.com ponuja najboljše spletne igr: Najigre.com offers the best web games and mobile games without any installation. Play all games on your mobile phone or computer
Igrajte ogromno najnovejših, najboljših: At najigre.com you can play a huge number of the latest, best and free top games on our web portal. Play them on your computer or on your mobile devices without additional installations. Only on najigre.com.
